span.span: The export with the contract name derived from the specified type parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 合約名稱是呼叫方法`T`。The contract name is the result of calling the method on `T`. 合約名稱使用比較執行區分大小寫且非語言比較的屬性。The contract name is compared by using the property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.

exception.span: 沒有任何具有合約名稱的 物件衍生自 物件中的 。

span.span: There are zero objects with the contract name derived from in the object.
-or-

span.span: There is more than one object with the contract name derived from in the object.

exception.span: 物件已經處置。

span.span: The object has been disposed of.

span.span: The exported object with the contract name derived from , if found; otherwise, the default value for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果找不到匯出的物件，這個方法會傳回適當的預設值`T`; 例如，整數類型零`false`針對布林類型，和`null`參考類型。If the exported object is not found, this method returns the appropriate default value for `T`; for example, zero for integer types, `false` for Boolean types, and `null` for reference types. 合約名稱是呼叫方法`T`。The contract name is the result of calling the method on `T`. 合約名稱使用比較執行區分大小寫且非語言比較的屬性。The contract name is compared by using the property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫這個方法不應該將基數相關不符視為錯誤，並不應該擲回例外狀況的情況。Overrides of this method should not treat cardinality-related mismatches as errors, and should not throw exceptions in those cases. 例如，如果是及沒有零符合指定條件的物件，空應該傳回的集合。For example, if is and there are zero objects that match the conditions of the specified , an empty collection should be returned.
